mapper.select: select u.class_id,c.courses_name,uu.user_name,ur.role_id,batch_name,r.role_name from user u left join teach t on u.class_id=t.class_id left join courses c on t.courses_id=c.courses_id left join user uu on uu.user_id=t.user_id left join userrole ur on u.user_id=ur.user_id left join papers pp on pp.role_id=ur.role_id left join batch b on b.batch_id=pp.batch_id left join role r on r.role_id=ur.role_id where u.user_id=#{user_id} and r.role_name!="教师" and batch_name!=""

select u.class_id,c.courses_name,uu.user_name,ur.role_id,batch_name,r.role_name from user u left join teach t on u.class_id=t.class_id left join courses c on t.courses_id=c.courses_id left join user uu on uu.user_id=t.user_id left join userrole ur on u.user_id=ur.user_id left join papers pp on pp.role_id=ur.role_id left join batch b on b.batch_id=pp.batch_id left join role r on r.role_id=ur.role_id where u.user_id=#{user_id} and r.role_name!="教师" and b.batch_id=#{batch_id}
